title: Europass EDC credential
description: Schema for EDC credential based on ELM 3.2

allOf.title: EBSI Verifiable Attestation
allOf.description: The schema defines a generic structure for any EBSI-related Verifiable Credentials according to the VCDM v2.0

oneOf.description: Semantic context for the issued credential. First element MUST be https://www.w3.org/ns/credentials/v2

id.description: Globally unique identifier for the issued credential. It can be a UUID or another globally unique identifier.

type.description: Full type chain, used to identify the credential base types

validFrom.description: Defines the earliest point when the credential becomes valid.

validUntil.description: Defines the latest point when the credential ceases to be valid.

credentialStatus.description: Defines suspension and/or revocation details for the issued credential. Further redefined by the type extension

id.description: Exact identity for the credential status

credentialSchema.description: One or more schemas that validate the Verifiable Credential.

credentialSubject.description: Defines additional information about the subject that is described by the Verifiable Accreditation
Defines information about the subject that is defined by the type chain

id.description: Defines the DID of the subject that is described by the issued credential

credentialSchema.description: Contains information about the credential schema on which the issued credential is based

id.description: References the credential schema stored on the Trusted Schemas Registry (TSR)

termsOfUse.description: Contains the terms under which the issued credential was issued

id.description: Contains a URL that points to where more information about this instance of terms of use can be found.
If present, it MUST contain a URL that points to where more information about this instance of evidence can be found.
